name: Guidelines
description:
Guide yourself through the chaos!

With increasing difficulty in time, this game will have you dodging red squares as you attempt to get the highest score among your friends. The game is simple in nature. If you get hit more than three times, you're done, game-over. The game is completely free!!!

---Made by:

[AS] Agira of Team Golden Galaxy

---TGG About:

We are Team Golden Galaxy, founded by [TGG] Blurain. We are a group of gamers that enjoy games. We also have a group of talented gfx artist, game devs, and video editors. This is a community profile, so aspect a variety of devs uploading different types of games.

Please leave constructive criticism in the reviews as it helps the game devs of TGG improve, leading to more quality games in the future!
